landing.title: MBA Jumpseat is the ultimate safety, risk & auditing tool for your airline
landing.paragraph1: Part 135 operations are a set of FAR guidelines relevant to non-scheduled, commercial aircraft operations. These can includeÂ air taxi flights and private air charters, among other types of transactional private jet situations.
landing.paragraph2: FAA has issued a Notice of Proposed Rulemaking (NPRM) that would require all Part 135 certificate holders to implement a Safety Management System (SMS)
landing.paragraph3: Duis vestibulum massa a arcu condimentum fermentum. Integer condimentum, sem id volutpat viverra, metus enim efficitur ante, eget aliquet erat tellus eget erat. Pellentesque commodo tellus et efficitur lacinia. Sed non elementum mauris, sit amet fermentum leo.

companyDetails.subtitle: Lets get started with some basic information about your company

companyDetails.countryInfo: Main operating base as per the AOC

administrativeDetails.subtitle: Now lets set up your system administrator & contact details

systemAdminstratorDetails.formSubitle: System administrator will be your first administrative user, with the ability to create users and assign permissions within Jumspeat SMS
systemAdminstratorDetails.passwordInfo: Password must have 8 Characters with one Uppercase letter, one Lowercase letter, one Number and one Special Character

secondaryContactDetails.formSubitle: Adding a Secondary Contact in this registration process will not create this person as a user on Jumpseat SMS. The Administrative User will create Users and assign permissions.
